MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 14-DEC-2020 12:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the TD9 postcode area of Hawick. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:35am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further fault investigations being required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:29am on Monday 14th of December 2020.
